title: World War 0x
description: World War 0x is Solana’s play-to-earn WW3 first-person shooter. Grab your soldier and hit the battlefield to collect and earn $WW3 and $BDUCK on maps like Donbas Woods, Penghu Islands and Korean Border — all in glorious low poly.
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![World War 0x-rr04o](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/9409a87ecc5844d395a4d4fb754be82f/world-war-0x-rr04o.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Welcome to Solana’s WW3 first-person shooter!
<!--text-->
World War 0x brings blockchain to the battlefield with exciting game modes like Conquest, Team Deathmatch, Capture Point and our upcoming Extraction mode. World War 0x’s decentralized collections, token and game are built on the Solana blockchain.

<!--image-->
![World War 0x-7vb60](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/9409a87ecc5844d395a4d4fb754be82f/world-war-0x-7vb60.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Grab a soldier to collect, earn and wager!
<!--text-->
Choose a soldier from over 50 countries and deploy to maps across the Pacific, Eastern European and Middle Eastern theatres. 

Soldier NFTs like the Battlewear, Country, Goldhead and upcoming women’s collections allow holders to collect and earn $WW3 and $BDUCK in-game.  Players can access ATMs in-game and receive health and ammo packs as well as withdraw and deposit $WW3 and $BDUCK.

<!--image-->
![World War 0x-o53vq](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/9409a87ecc5844d395a4d4fb754be82f/world-war-0x-o53vq.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# A live game to reflect the World War 3 conflict featuring authentic maps, vehicles, weapons and uniforms.
<!--text-->
We will continue to improve on our offering of maps by adding more higher polished, higher quality maps, both large and small. The maps will be based on real possible World War 3 battle locations in the Pacific, Eastern European and Middle Eastern theatres.

<!--image-->
![World War 0x-xmsk3](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/9409a87ecc5844d395a4d4fb754be82f/world-war-0x-xmsk3.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Play your way! Cross play and controller support bring together the community
<!--text-->
Crossplay across platforms allows you to continue the fight while away from your PC. Controller support lets you play with both PlayStation and Xbox controllers.

<!--image-->
![World War 0x-8mnwd](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/9409a87ecc5844d395a4d4fb754be82f/world-war-0x-8mnwd.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Weapon and Loadout Customization
<!--text-->
World War 0x offers a wide range of firearms at your disposal. All firearms can be equipped with a variety of attachments, allowing you to customize your weapon to meet the demands of any tactical situation.

Choose from a large amount of authentic WW3 weapons, attachments and gadgets. In World War 0x there are more weapons than ever including assault rifles, sniper rifles, shotguns, SMGs, LMGs and pistols. Every weapon has its own unlock progression, allowing you to equip new accessories such as optics, grips, and barrel attachments. Each weapon has many customization slots allowing you to change from optics, accessories, barrel attachments, underbarrel equipment and paint schemes. Tailor your weapon to the mission at hand and gain the edge on the battlefield.

<!--image-->
![World War 0x-knkfh](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/9409a87ecc5844d395a4d4fb754be82f/world-war-0x-knkfh.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Vehicles by land, air and sea!
<!--text-->
Dominate the battlefield with vehicles from heavy duty battle tanks, gun boats, helicopters and fighter jets to fast moving jet skis, RHIBs, motorcycles, MRAPS and LAVs.

<!--image-->
![World War 0x-l9qub](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/9409a87ecc5844d395a4d4fb754be82f/world-war-0x-l9qub.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# $BDUCK is World War 0x’s meme coin
<!--text-->
$BDUCK is the official meme coin of World War 0x. Boomer Duck is a disgruntled retired boomer who is sick of meme dogs shitting on his lawn. Players can find large $BDUCK tokens spinning and floating in-game and hidden around maps to allow players to explore and find them. Collected coins can be used to purchase skins, weapons and items.

<!--image-->
![World War 0x-5wz6k](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/9409a87ecc5844d395a4d4fb754be82f/world-war-0x-5wz6k.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Community is the heart and soul of World War 0x
<!--text-->
Our Discord server is the main hub for interactions. By joining, you can share feedback, report bugs, find squad members and engage with other players.

The World War 0x community will vote on which maps are next, which theatres and countries to focus on and which authentic tanks, planes, boats and weapons should be recreated in low poly.

<!--image-->
![World War 0x-roh99](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/9409a87ecc5844d395a4d4fb754be82f/world-war-0x-roh99.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# What’s next for World War 0x
<!--text-->
We’ve built the core gameplay features for World War 0x and are now focused on adding more higher polished game modes and maps, optimizing all platforms, improving player count and adding in the features the players love the most. 

Tighter movement and vehicle controls with smoother, more optimized gameplay. We’ll add more blockchain support to allow players to fully mint and buy/sell tokens and NFTs in-game. A completed UI/UX with an improved sign up and new player flow and an Extraction game mode are on the horizon.
